core:
You need Watchful, Shadowy, Dangerous or Persuasive 100
to begin this. This includes bonuses from equipment.

Watch for a gold bordered card in the London Opportunities deck
that mentions a *coincidence*.
Meet the Ambitious Barrister in Your Lodgings.

Look for any one of these cards in the London Opportunities deck:
- A matter of the wardrobe
- A respectable address
- A little hideaway
- Friends and acquaintances
Look for **Sufficient Importance** in Your Lodgings.
There's an interesting briefcase in Your Lodgings.
Meet the Ambitious Barrister in the Bazaar Side-Streets
Acquire a Velocipede in the Bazaar Side-Streets.
Finish up in the Bazaar Side-Streets.
Congratulations! You are a Person of Some Importance.
